<< datenum time functions cputime >>

sleep

Suspend code execution.

Syntax

sleep(sec)

Input argument

n

a double: duration of the sleep in seconds (decimal number).

Description

sleep stops Nelson processing any instruction for a speficied number of seconds.

CTRL-C interruption stops sleep.

Example

tic();sleep(1);toc()
tic();sleep(0.1);toc()
tic();sleep(0.01);toc()

See also

tic, toc.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
